name: Time has run out (app 2) (other party is solicitor)
body:
Your ((partner))'s solicitor created ((isDivorce??a divorce application))((isDissolution??an application to end your civil partnership)) and invited you to review and join it. You should have done it by ((date of response)).

#What you can do
You can still join the application, unless your ((partner))'s solicitor has started a new application. 

1. Create your ((isDivorce??divorce account))((isDissolution??account to end your civil partnership)) and sign in ((create account link))
2. Enter your unique reference number: ((reference number))
3. Enter your access code: ((access code))

If you have already created an account, then you can sign in here: ((signin url)) 

If you do not want to join the application, then you can either ignore this notification or contact your ((partner)) or their solicitor, if it's safe to do so. 

DDivorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Action required: ((isDivorce??application for your divorce))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
